active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the impact of NIST SP 800-171 Rev 3 changes on small contractors: Does the alignment with NIST SP 800-53 Moderate baseline make compliance easier or more burdensome, considering CMMC integration and DFARS reporting requirements? Provide pros, cons, and real-world examples from DoD implementations, addressing common misconceptions about revisions being minor updates.
active_learning.peer_teaching: In pairs, one student explains core concepts like SSP, POA&M, and ODPs using examples/non-examples of CUI (e.g., technical specs as CUI Basic vs. marketing materials as non-CUI), then switch roles to cover CUI categories (Basic vs. Specified) and their handling differences. Peers provide feedback on clarity and accuracy to reinforce teach-back.
active_learning.problem_solving: Present a scenario: A mid-sized DoD contractor handling CUI fails a NIST SP 800-171A assessment with gaps in Audit and Accountability (3.3) and System and Communications Protection (3.13). In small groups, identify control gaps, prioritize remediation in a POA&M template, propose cost-effective solutions (e.g., open-source tools), and present risk reductions.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
